content: Comparison Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 20 Aug 2018Is there any difference between POEM custodian account and pre-paid account? Like in terms of fees you are paying?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenichi Xi, nᴉʍ oʇ dǝnᴉʇsǝd 不能说的秘密 at Tag Team with Gabriel ThamLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Custodian Account have higher commission and allows Contra Trading.Prepaid Account have lower commission due to the fact that Cash are paid out front to the product or position purchased.The main difference will be the commission rate and Contra ability.0 comments0

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Here is the difference:https://www.poems.com.sg/phillip-investment-accounts/​Basically, custodian account will mean you have to pay custodian fees. Your shares are also not kept in CDP but with POEMS as custodian.​Prepaid means you have to fund your account before any stock purchases. 0 comments0
